data.description: Join Nokia Bell Labs’ Decentralized Systems Research team as a summer intern in Murray Hill, NJ, and help shape the future of AI/ML systems. In this role, you’ll explore cutting-edge research focused on optimizing performance, scalability, and efficiency across diverse software and hardware environments. You’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with world-class researchers, contribute to new innovations, publish in top-tier venues, and even pursue patents. This internship offers a unique chance to expand your expertise while working at the forefront of decentralized and intelligent systems.
